hit_icon: Select a colored icon with results.
no_matches: No search results, in this category.
dialog_search_favo_food:
Search your favorite food:

  🍔 Burger     🍰 Dessert

  🥗 Salad      🐮 Vegan

  🇮🇹 Italian      🍕 Pizza
toast_instructions_marker: MARKER: Tap any marker to see more information of that selected place.
toast_instructions_location: LOCATION: Tap the location button (top right) to zoom to your current location.
toast_instructions_close: CLOSE: Tap the close button (bottom) to see the complete list of all places worldwide.
toast_instructions_details: DETAILS: Tap the info box to load the details of that place.
toast_instructions_route: ROUTE: Tap the route button (bottom right), to navigate to the selected place.
toast_instructions_map: MAP: Tap the map at any free space, to close the info box of a selected place.
toaster_enter_name_atleast_five_characte: Please enter a name with atleast 5 characters!
toaster_atleast_one_bitcoin_adr: Please add atleast a DASH or a BCH address!
toaster_full_adr: Please enter the FULL ADDRESS: Street, Number, State & Country!
toaster_select_email_client: Please select your favorite E-Mail client!
dialog_help_grow_adoption:
Help to grow adoption!

Send the missing information to:

trbc@bitcoinmap.cash now!
email_text_add_new_place:
Welcome to http://bmap.cash!

You can optionally attach Images to this email now!

Send this E-Mail to submit the place!

We will notify you as soon as the place is available inside the app!

Do not modify the content of this E-Mail!

To add any further details please send another E-Mail to trbc@bitcoinmap.cash!

You are Satoshi Nakamoto!

Thanks!
add_place_name_title: What is the name of that place?
add_place_name_subtitle: Use the same name as in Google Maps
copy_adr_instructions: 1: Open your BCH wallet! 2: Choose receive to see the QR-Code! 3: Select share/copy! 4: Paste the address here!
receiving_adr: What is your BCH wallet receiving address?
open_your_dash_wallet: 1: Open your DASH wallet! 2: Choose receive to see the QR-Code! 3: Select share/copy! 4: Paste the address here!
what_is_your_dash: What is your DASH wallet receiving address?
hit_the_button_scroll: Hit the button, scroll the list, choose a tag
choose_four_tags: OK, now choose four words that best describe your products/service.
